Public Member Functions

DpdPair Class Reference
Pair Interactions

Detailed Description

The soft potential introduced in DPD simulations of Groot et al.

Member functions evaluate energy and force for an individual pair of nonbonded interacting particles.

Definition at line 29 of file DpdPair.h.

#include <DpdPair.h>

Definition at line 199 of file DpdPair.h.

double forceOverR ( double  rsq,
int  i,
int  j 
) const [inline]

Returns ratio of scalar pair interaction force to pair separation.

Multiply this quantity by the components of the separation vector to obtain the force vector. A positive value for the return value represents a repulsive force between a pair of particles.

Parameters:
rsqsquare of distance between particles
itype of particle 1
jtype of particle 2
Returns:
force divided by distance
